name: Dare to Square
description:
This game was made for Geojam 2022

controls: Arrow keys

The menu will be in the game after the jam, due to issues with Construct 3

rules:

The goal of the game is to survive the longest, once starting you bust pick a side in 3 seconds and dodge the bullets, once the first 3 seconds have passed, you'll no longer be able to switch sides, though you can screen wrap on the top and bottom of the side, good luck!
